articles.description: Mayank Yadav’s sensational rise has excited cricket fans but not long ago there was Umran Malik who was touted as a generational talent.
articles.content: Mayank Yadavs sensational rise has excited cricket fans but not long ago there was a fast bowler who was touted as another generational talent. Sarah Waris charts the rise and the dip of Umran Malik,… [+6055 chars]

articles.author: Shivani Naik
articles.title: In no rush to become ‘next Sindhu’, badminton prodigy Anmol Kharb remains grounded but turns ‘audacious’ - The Indian Express
articles.description: The star of India's Asian team title, 17-year-old - who defeated higher-ranked Indian Malvika Basod in Kazakhstan International Challenge on Wednesday - focussed on the shortcomings rather than revelling in success as she charts her next step.
articles.content: Anmol Kharb’s wise coach Kusum Singh is in no hurry to furnish the ‘next Sindhu’ to India’s clamouring sports followers, eager to watch another Indian women’s singles badminton star, soar. There are … [+5462 chars]
